title: Daughter of Death
description: Hailey Blackwell is living the normal everyday life of a teenage girl, which usually revolves around school and friends. But when Hailey’s boyfriend comes clean about cheating on her, she loses it and accidentally run herself off the bridge. That brush off with death has her life starting to undergo certain changes. She can now see the departed, is sharing a part of her soul with a spirit and is in contact with an angel of death. Life couldn’t get any more complicated than that, right? But mix in new love interests in the form of Eric and Dean, for variety. Then dash some secrets―secrets that she hasn’t thought life has hidden from her. Now, that’s complicated.
author: Ava Rhodes
